temp.fibHeap.stixar.graph.attr
Interface EdgeData

All Known Subinterfaces:
EdgeMap<T>, EdgeSink<T>, EdgeSource<T>, NativeEdgeMap
All Known Implementing Classes:
APSP.PosWeightEdgeMap, ArrayEdgeMap, ByteEdgeMap, CharEdgeMap, DoubleEdgeMap, FloatEdgeMap, IntEdgeMap, LongEdgeMap
public interface EdgeData

Interface for attribute managers to communicate with edge attribute data.

Method Summary
 void clear()
          Clear all the entries in the map.
 void grow(int cap)
          Ensure the attribute set has capacity for storing attributes for cap edges.
 void shrink(int cap, int[] fillPerm)
          Shrink the capacity to size cap, and compact the attributes according to a given permutation.
 

Method Detail

grow

void grow(int cap)
Ensure the attribute set has capacity for storing attributes for cap edges.

Parameters:
cap - the new capacity for the set, which is greater than the capacity specified in the last call to either this method or shrink(int, int[]).

shrink

void shrink(int cap,
            int[] fillPerm)
Shrink the capacity to size cap, and compact the attributes according to a given permutation.

Parameters:
cap - the new capacity.
fillPerm - a permutation of the node ids, with the following properties:
  1. If there is an edge with id i, then fillPerm[i] >= 0.
  2. If there is no edge with id i then fillPerm[i] = -1.
  3. Monotonicity: fillPerm[j] > fillPerm[i] <=> j > i for every i and j such that there is an edge with id i and there is an edge with id j.

clear

void clear()
Clear all the entries in the map.
